CustomField.description: Date after which the article will no longer appear in the "Featured" section. A empty value means no expiration date. Does not apply to records with the "Is Keyword Article" checked.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Date after which the article will no longer appear in the "Featured" section. A empty value means no expiration date. Does not apply to records with the "Is Keyword Article" checked.
CustomField.label: Featured Expiration
